posts.body: Water which is too pure has no fish.
posts.author: Ts'ai Ken T'an

posts.body: A spirit of thunder, lightning, and rain in the form of a huge bird.
posts.author: Indians

posts.body: The double law of attraction and radiation or of sympathy and antipathy is the principle of Creation.
posts.author: Albert Pike

posts.body: You have to separate the chaff from the wheat.
posts.author: Proverb

posts.body: Every adversity has within it the seeds of an equivalent benefit.
posts.author: Unknown

posts.body: The eggs do not teach the hen.
posts.author: Proverb

posts.body: Life is to short to stuff a mushroom.
posts.author: Shirley Conran
